official-title.#text: To provide for the release of the property interests retained by the United States in certain land conveyed in 1954 by the United States, acting through the Director of the Bureau of Land Management, to the State of Oregon for the establishment of the Hermiston Agricultural Research and Extension Center of Oregon State University in Hermiston, Oregon.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

action-desc.#text: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed

action-instruction.#text: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on October 29, 2013

action-desc.#text: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Release of retained interests in Bureau of Land Management land conveyed to the State of Oregon for establishment of Hermiston Agricultural Research and Extension Center

quote.#tail: and dated July 23, 2013, is hereby released without consideration.
quote.#text: Hermiston Agricultural Research and Extension Center

text.#text: Any reservation or reversionary interest retained by the United States to the approximately 290 acres in Hermiston, Oregon, depicted as

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , shall execute and file in the appropriate office a deed of release, amended deed, or other appropriate instrument reflecting the release of retained interests under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Director of the Bureau of Land Management

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3366 RH: Hermiston Reversionary Interest Release Act

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
